mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WEEKSUBJECT WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN STARTDATE AND STARTDATE+6
SELECT * FROM PROLIST WHERE WSCODE=( SELECT WSCODE FROM WEEKSUBJECT WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN STARTDATE AND STARTDATE+6 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROLIST VALUES( ( SELECT WSCODE FROM WEEKSUBJECT WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN STARTDATE AND STARTDATE+6 ),#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROLIST WHERE WSCODE=( SELECT WSCODE FROM WEEKSUBJECT WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN STARTDATE AND STARTDATE+6 )
